name: portfolio-api
description: Backend service for the portfolio app
author: Chad Martin

scripts.deploy:dev: npm run build && npm run package:dev && npm run deploy:packaged:dev
scripts.deploy:test: npm run build && npm run package:test && npm run deploy:packaged:test
scripts.deploy:prod: npm run build && npm run package:prod && npm run deploy:packaged:prod
scripts.deploy:packaged:dev: sam deploy --template-file packaged.yaml --region us-east-1 --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM CAPABILITY_NAMED_IAM --s3-prefix -portfolio-stack-dev --stack-name portfolio-stack-dev --parameter-overrides Stage=dev
scripts.deploy:packaged:test: sam deploy --template-file packaged.yaml --region us-east-1 --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM CAPABILITY_NAMED_IAM --s3-prefix -portfolio-stack-test --stack-name portfolio-stack-test --parameter-overrides Stage=test
scripts.deploy:packaged:prod: sam deploy --template-file packaged.yaml --region us-east-1 --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM CAPABILITY_NAMED_IAM --s3-prefix -portfolio-stack-prod --stack-name portfolio-stack-prod --parameter-overrides Stage=prod
